channel.title: Run botten in source wont work
channel.description: hello this is killershand6 and im makin a sever and ive ran in to a problem one day i got on my pc and i tryed to run my source and i get an error that says "'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file" i need help plz how do i fix this so i can run it again? killershand6

item.title: Run botten in source wont work
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Edit the Run Button and change your Java Jdk to what you have.

P.S. This may be for the client, Im not sure

Read full topic
item.source: Run botten in source wont work

hello this is killershand6
and im makin a sever and ive ran in to a problem

that says “‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file”
